title: Monarch Specialties I 9009 Ottoman, Pouf, Footrest, Foot Stool, 12" Round, Velvet, Wood Legs, Green, Natural, Contemporary, Modern
features: VERSATILE AND LIGHTWEIGHT - Ideal for use in a living room or bedroom as a pouf for sitting, a foot stool to rest your feet, or an improvised table surface, this ottoman weighs only 6 lbs and can be easily carried to any room in need of an extra seat

SOLID WOOD LEGS - Thick, cylindrical wooden legs provide support, while crossbars connect the legs for added stability and act as footrests; the natural wood color is a neutral tone that brings a touch of lightness and coordinates with most décors3
COMFORTABLE PADDED SEAT - Turquoise velvet fabric with a luxuriously plush texture covers the round seat that is padded for a soft yet supportive feel

NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED - This upholstered ottoman comes fully assembled for convenience—just unpack and enjoy; it measures 12.25 inches L x 12.25 inches W x 16.25 inches H and has a weight limit of 300 lbs

CHOOSE WITH CONFIDENCE - Monarch Specialties is a leader in furniture and home décor, developing products that offer outstanding value and style for over 50 years; your purchase will be well packaged for protection and to facilitate timely delivery
description: Meet the ideal sidekick for a sofa or chair: this small round ottoman with solid wood legs. Kick up your feet and rest them on the padded seat that is upholstered in a polyester fabric with a luxuriously plush, velvety texture. Supporting the soft, cushioned seat are 4 sturdy wooden legs that have a cylindrical shape and are slanted to better distribute weight. For additional stability, the legs are connected by crossbars which also function as footrests. The natural color of the wood legs is a light, neutral tone that coordinates with most décors while the turquoise velvet fabric brings a splash of color. The round shape and thickness of the seat and legs give this pouf a simple, inviting charm that will add warmth to your living room or bedroom. Use it as a foot stool in front of a chair or couch. Next to a bed, it becomes a small table surface for placing reading material or a mobile device. Kids will love using it as a comfy stool to sit on. Plus, this ottoman is lightweight and portable so you can easily carry it to any room where you need an extra seat.

title: Cozy & Cute Monarch Specialties Footrest Review
